nodes.text: This child was held prisoner in the shaper research facility on Dibrook. He was imprisoned along with his parents in a large bubble. When Tsalok fled the planet, he ordered the captured prisoners to be converted into thralls to send a message to the rescuers. Arbeloa managed to rip open the enclosure and secure a breathing mask on the child to prevent him from inhaling the gas that caused the transformation.
He was later clad in an enviro-suit and fell asleep in Arbeloa's arms.
